attributes.action: lobby for the end of the proliferation of Landmines across the world. In particular we hope, he will be willing to address the major powers such as China and the US and demand they cease the creation of these heinous weapons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are attempting to raise awareness of the political issue of the profileration of landmines across the South East Asain region. We hope, by collecting sufficent support, that the UK government would be willing to put more pressure, on the major distributors of these heinous weapons (as as the US and China) and call for an end to the spread of these weapons. We further ask, that the UK government consider adopting more active efforts in the removal of mines in areas such as Cambodia, so the children there have a chance to live fuller, happier lives.
